import React from "react"; import ShelfChangerMov from "./ShelfChangerMov"; const WanttoRead = props => { return (

Want to Read

    {props.wantToRead && props.wantToRead.map((bookinner, i) => (
  1. {bookinner.title}
    {!bookinner.authors ? "Oopss! No Author" : bookinner.authors.map(author => author)}
    2. ))}
  2. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  3. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
); }; export default WanttoRead;
